products.name: God of War: Ragnarok
products.description: Join Kratos and Atreus on a new journey in God of War: Ragnarok, an action-adventure game set in Norse mythology.

products.name: Halo Infinite
products.description: Experience the next chapter in the Halo saga with Halo Infinite, a first-person shooter game featuring new characters and locations.

products.name: Cyberpunk 2077
products.description: Explore Night City, a dark and dangerous open-world in Cyberpunk 2077, an action-adventure RPG set in a futuristic dystopia.

products.name: Ghost of Tsushima
products.description: Join Jin Sakai on a journey of vengeance and redemption in Ghost of Tsushima, an action-adventure game set in feudal Japan.

products.name: Forza Horizon 5
products.description: Discover the beauty and danger of Mexico in Forza Horizon 5, an open-world racing game featuring hundreds of cars and tracks.

products.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
products.description: Experience the epic tale of outlaw Arthur Morgan in Red Dead Redemption 2, an action-adventure game set in the late 1800s.

products.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
products.description: Unleash the power of the Dragonborn in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, an open-world RPG set in a world of magic and adventure.

products.name: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
products.description: Relive the classic Halo trilogy with Halo: The Master Chief Collection, a collection of remastered first-person shooter games.

products.name: Final Fantasy VII Remake
products.description: Experience the epic tale of Cloud Strife in Final Fantasy VII Remake, a modern reimagining of the classic RPG.

products.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
products.description: Join Eivor on a journey to build a new home in Assassin's Creed Valhalla, an action-adventure RPG set in Viking Age England.
